author: husted
msg: Submitted by Ted Husted.  Updated "presentation tags" segment to include present/notPresent, and omit 0.5 versions. Updated beginning of "Automatic Form Validation" section to omit non-HTTP version (beyond scope of users guide).
<section name="3.3.3 Other Useful Presentation Tags" href="presentation_tags">
There are several tags useful for creating presentations, consult the documentation
on each specific tag library, along with the Tag Developers Guides, for more
for each element of a specified collection (which can be an Enumeration,
a Hashtable, a Vector, or an array of objects).

property attribute, in which case the name attribute is also required. The
attributes include cookie, header, name, parameter, property, role, scope,

author: craigmcc
msg: Remove unnecessary reference to deprecated ErrorMessages class.

author: craigmcc
msg: Tweak the class path sent to JavaDoc so that it can see the servlet.jar
classes.  Also, move a variable declaration to avoid JavaDoc warnings
about an @exception clause on a variable declaration.
